  • time

Command: time

Displays the current time for one or more time zones.

Alias: t

Arguments: <zone1>[, [zone2], [zone3], ...]

Permission: user

Examples:

?time los angeles
?time los angeles, japan, paris
?time angel, japa, pari
--- aliased ---
?t los angeles
?t los angeles, japan, paris
?t angel, japa, pari
